neural

Class AbstractNeuron

  • java.lang.Object
    • neural.AbstractNeuron
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InputNeuron, SigmoidNeuron

    public abstract class AbstractNeuron
extends java.lang.Object
    An artificial neuron.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractNeuron

        public AbstractNeuron(AbstractNeuron[] inputs,
              double[] weights,
              double bias)
        Parameters:
        inputs - Neurons giving input to this one.
        weights - Weights associated with the inputs.
        bias - Bias weight, effectively associated with a constant input of -1.
